Summary: large spheere witn many small ones
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around August 16th 1979
divs: Sighting Detailsthought we saw planet by naked eye, got 6" diameter telescope and watched large orange globe with hundreds of smaller spheeres circling around same, periodically one of the small spheres would leave and another would join, watched for a couple hours
